name: Turnpike Troubadours
description: The '''Turnpike Troubadours''' are an American [[country music]] band from [[Tahlequah, Oklahoma]], founded in 2005. They started their own imprint, Bossier City Records, in 2007 and have released six studio albums. Their [[The Turnpike Troubadours (album)|self-titled 2015 album]] peaked at number 17 on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]].
